entries.content: 8+ years of experience in the software industry
Enthusiastic about full-stack technologies, especially Node.js and React.js
Team player, technical supporter and mentor

blocks.title: Senior Full-stack Engineer
entries: Developed new features in both backend and frontend for "Further", a learning-by-making platform on top of Raspberry Pi hardware devices
Worked with stakeholders to clarify requirements from thousands of teachers and students in North America and Europe
Contributed to improving the project’s structure and performance, as well as the team’s work process

blocks.title: Senior Full-stack Engineer
entries: In charge of the architecture and the design of WeFit mobile application, an online-to-offline platform which connects users and local fitness studios, serving 200,000+ users with 2000+ daily active users
Built web-based tools which manage 10,000+ user bookings and revenues for 300+ fitness partners monthly
Trained/mentored 20+ potential middle managers on management and leadership skills, as well as start-up cultures

blocks.title: Development Team Lead then Operations Manager
entries: Managed Operations department of 30 to connect 200+ instructors and create 500+ video courses for "Edumall", a short-course learning platform
Led development team of 10 to build and launch Web, iOS and Android applications for "Memo", an English learning product, serving 150,000+ users with 3000+ daily active users

blocks.title: Mobile Developer
entries: Led a team of 3 to develop 5 different mobile applications for Singapore marketplace
Advised customers on choosing proper technical stacks and decisions, maintained and upgraded the products on request
